attributes.action: prevail on the Treasury to scrap the recent increase in Air Passenger Duty which is an extortionate blunt instrument
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent doubling of the Air Passenger Duty is extortionate and will only swell the Government coffers. Global warming is a myth and customers of airlines who use British airports are being penalised in the name of environmentalism. The tax is another way of saying "don't do business with Britain - we're expensive." We suggest the APD is replaced with a fee that covers the Government's costs towards Civil Aviation - and no more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
